item.title: Video Editor UGC e-commerce brand - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a e-commerce video editor with experience of ad editing.

We'll provide the script framework to follow ( https://docs.google.com/document/d/1caIB7Fl5eTL5lkxE6c_kWNcEkgZ_1RGMGV1h3mVZOe4/edit?usp=sharing ) and we will provide the video RAW content ( https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Ohb58Oq36jmJWGH_fs6hchC0-BNVO86N?usp=sharing )

All you'll have to do, is to make an ad following the framework provided, with the raw video content provided too.

For the voice over, we'll provide it directly to you. This job can end on a long-term partnership. Comment UGC editing if you're interested by the job

Hourly Range: $10.00-$27.00

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Corporate Video, Short Video Ad, Video Advertising, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Shopify Dropshipping, Ad Content Creation, Video Ad

item.title: Animation Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented Animation Video Creator to help us plan and create a captivating and humorous video to explain the value of our software and how to use it. The video should engage our audience and effectively communicate the key features and benefits of our software in a fun and entertaining way. As an Animation Video Creator, you will be responsible for working our concepts into scripts/storyboards/character design/animation, and sound design. This project requires a creative and imaginative individual with a strong understanding of animation principles and experience in creating engaging and memorable videos.
  Skills needed:
  - Animation
  - Video editing
  - Scriptwriting
  - Storyboarding
  - Character design
  - Sound design
  
  If you have a knack for storytelling and can bring our software to life through animation, we want to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 05:59 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Video Production, Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Production, Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Videographer Needed for GC Video Series - Upwork
item.description:
Project Overview:
Guidance College (GC), an Islamic institution of higher learning, is seeking a professional videographer to produce a video series promoting our academic programs. This project aims to significantly boost the visibility and awareness of our college, showcasing the unique educational opportunities available. The videos will be tailored for seamless integration across various platforms including social media, websites, and direct digital distribution. The desired presentation style is professional, energetic, and smoothly paced.

Project Details:

•Preproduction Planning: Collaborative meetings via Zoom, phone calls, and emails to outline video objectives and script alignment with GC’s goals.
•Preproduction Tasks: Scriptwriting, video outlining, graphic design for titles and informational slides, background sound/music selection, and storyboard creation.
•Production: Travel to Houston, Texas, and possibly Dallas, for on-location shoots.
•Video Formats: Videos should be produced in 30-second and 60-second versions, with some extended cuts lasting 2-3 minutes.

Required Skills and Equipment:
•Proven expertise in video production, particularly in educational or promotional video creation.
•Ability to handle all aspects of video production, from preproduction planning to shooting and post-production.
•Access to professional-grade video production equipment.

Deliverables:
•A series of (6-10) concise, high-quality videos in multiple formats for varied platform use.
•All videos should align with the branding and promotional goals of Guidance College.
Location: On-site production at two locations in Houston and possibly Dallas, Texas.

Proposal Requirements:
•Detailed proposal outlining your approach to the project.
•Total cost estimation, including travel expenses.
•Portfolio of previous work, especially in similar projects.

How to Apply:
Please submit your proposal directly through this Upwork listing. Include any relevant experience, particularly in the field of educational or promotional videography, and outline your project plan and budget.


Budget: $5,000
Posted On: June 19, 2024 05:57 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Videography, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Videography, Video Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Little Red Book Social Media Video & Post Content Creation - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone who is an expert in setting up a brand/account on The Little Red Book social media app. I need someone who can read and translate mandarin and create content from what is supplied from English into Mandarin for the app. We require this person to design the posts/create the video in Mandarin and upload into the app.

Any comments that come up on the posts, we need this person to translate and come back to us with any questions so we can provide the right answers.

We require someone who is proficient in social media management, only in Little Red Book.


Posted On: June 19, 2024 05:49 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Content Creation, Social Media Management, Mandarin Chinese, Mandarin Chinese to English Translation, Video Editing, Content Writing, Graphic Design, Creative Writing, Video Production
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Content Creation, Social Media Management, Mandarin Chinese, Mandarin Chinese to English Translation, Video Editing, Content Writing, Graphic Design, Creative Writing, Video Production
Country: Australia

item.title: Promotional Video Creator for Wellness & Education Program - Upwork
item.description:
We're on the hunt for a talented Promotional Video Creator to craft compelling video content that captures the essence of our wellness and education program. The ideal candidate will be adept at sourcing high-quality footage from platforms like Shutterstock and weaving them seamlessly into persuasive narratives.

Content Sourcing: Efficiently locate and acquire suitable video clips from Shutterstock or similar platforms that align with our brand and program's objectives.
Video Creation: Produce compelling promotional videos that effectively communicate the essence of our program to potential participants.
Narrative Development: Understand our program's goals and target audience to develop narratives that resonate and inspire action.
Collaboration: Work closely with our marketing and content teams to ensure video content is in line with campaign objectives and brand voice.
Feedback Implementation: Be open to feedback and make iterative changes to video content as needed.
Stay Updated: Keep abreast of the latest trends in video marketing and integrate best practices.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 05:20 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Trailer
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Trailer
Country: United States
click to apply
